thread.title: Kerry: Climate change, food security key to global stability
thread.title_full: Kerry: Climate change, food security key to global stability - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Matthew Lee, Ap Diplomatic Writer
title: Kerry: Climate change, food security key to global stability
text: Photo: Luca Bruno, AP US Secretary of State John Kerry waves as he arrives at the Expo World's Fair taking place in Milan, Italy, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. US Secretary of State John Kerry waves as he arrives at the Expo... MILAN (AP) — The stability of the world is directly linked to climate change and its impact on food security for billions of people, U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry said on Saturday. US Secretary of State John Kerry waves as he arrives at the Expo World's Fair taking place in Milan, Italy, Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015. US Secretary of State John Kerry waves as he arrives at the Expo... MILAN (AP) — The stability of the world is directly linked to climate change and its impact on food security for billions of people, U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry said on Saturday.
